Author: .NET Team
Description:
Find out about the new features in .NET 11 Preview 1 across the .NET runtime, SDK, libraries, ASP.NET Core, Blazor, C#, .NET MAUI, and more!

The post [.NET 11 Preview 1 is now available!](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/dotnet-11-preview-1/) appeared first on [.NET Blog](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet).
EnhancedContent:
Today, we are excited to announce the first preview release of .NET 11! We just shipped our **first** preview release, adding to some major enhancements across the .NET Runtime, SDK, libraries, C#, ASP.NET Core, Blazor, .NET MAUI, and more. Check out the full release notes linked below and get started today.

[Download .NET 11 Preview 1](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet/11.0)

This release contains the following improvements.

## **üìöLibraries**

- [Zstandard Compression Support](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/libraries.md#zstandard-compression-support)
- [BFloat16 Floating-Point Type](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/libraries.md#bfloat16-floating-point-type)
- [ZipArchiveEntry Improvements](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/libraries.md#ziparchiveentry-improvements)
- [FrozenDictionary Collection Expression Support](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/libraries.md#frozendictionary-collection-expression-support)
- [TimeZone Improvements](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/libraries.md#timezone-improvements)
- [Rune Support Across String, StringBuilder, and TextWriter](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/libraries.md#rune-support-across-string-stringbuilder-and-textwriter)
- [MediaTypeMap for MIME Type Lookups](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/libraries.md#mediatypemap-for-mime-type-lookups)
- [HMAC and KMAC Verification APIs](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/libraries.md#hmac-and-kmac-verification-apis)
- [Hard Link Creation APIs](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/libraries.md#hard-link-creation-apis)
- [DivisionRounding for Integer Division Modes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/libraries.md#divisionrounding-for-integer-division-modes)
- [Happy Eyeballs Support in Socket.ConnectAsync](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/libraries.md#happy-eyeballs-support-in-socketconnectasync)
- [Performance Improvements](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/libraries.md#performance-improvements)
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/libraries.md)

## **‚è±Ô∏èRuntime**

- [Runtime Async](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/runtime.md#runtime-async)
- [CoreCLR on WebAssembly](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/runtime.md#webassembly)
- [Interpreter Expansion](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/runtime.md#interpreter-coreclr)
- [JIT Performance Improvements](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/runtime.md#jit)
- [GC Heap Hard Limit for 32-bit Processes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/runtime.md#gc)
- [RISC-V and s390x Architecture Enablement](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/runtime.md#architecture-enablement)
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/runtime.md)

## **üõ†Ô∏è SDK**

- [`dotnet run`
: Interactive Target Framework and Device Selection](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/sdk.md#dotnet-run-interactive-target-framework-and-device-selection)
- [`dotnet test`
: Positional Arguments](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/sdk.md#dotnet-test-positional-arguments)
- [`dotnet watch`
: Hot Reload Reference Changes and Configurable Ports](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/sdk.md#dotnet-watch-hot-reload-reference-changes-and-configurable-ports)
- [New Code Analyzers](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/sdk.md#new-analyzers)
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/sdk.md)

## **üî® MSBuild**

- [Terminal Logger Improvements](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/msbuild.md#terminal-logger-improvements)
- [MSBuild Language and Evaluation Fixes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/msbuild.md#msbuild-language-and-evaluation-fixes)
- [New APIs and Capabilities](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/msbuild.md#new-apis-and-capabilities)
- [Performance Improvements](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/msbuild.md#performance-improvements)
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/msbuild.md)

## **C#**

- [Collection Expression Arguments](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/csharp.md#collection-expression-arguments)
- [Extended Layout Support](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/csharp.md#extended-layout-support)
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/csharp.md)

## **F#**

This release you will find updates across the [F# compiler](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/fsharp.md#compiler-performance), including parallel compilation enabled by default, faster compilation of computation expression-heavy code, new features like `--disableLanguageFeature` and `--typecheck-only` for FSI, the [ML compatibility removal](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/fsharp.md#breaking-changes), and [bug fixes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/fsharp.md#bug-fixes-and-other-improvements).

## **Visual Basic**

.NET 11 Preview 1 doesn‚Äôt include any new Visual Basic language features or breaking changes. Browse the [full release notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/visualbasic.md) for details.

## **üåê ASP.NET Core & Blazor**

- [EnvironmentBoundary Component](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/aspnetcore.md#environmentboundary-component)
- [Label Component for Forms](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/aspnetcore.md#label-component-for-forms)
- [DisplayName Component](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/aspnetcore.md#displayname-component)
- [QuickGrid `OnRowClick`
Event](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/aspnetcore.md#quickgrid-onrowclick-event)
- [Relative Navigation with `RelativeToCurrentUri`](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/aspnetcore.md#relative-navigation-with-relativetocurrenturi)
- [SignalR `ConfigureConnection`
for Interactive Server Components](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/aspnetcore.md#signalr-configureconnection-for-interactive-server-components)
- [`IHostedService`
Support in Blazor WebAssembly](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/aspnetcore.md#ihostedservice-support-in-blazor-webassembly)
- [OpenAPI Schema Support for Binary File Responses](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/aspnetcore.md#openapi-schema-support-for-binary-file-responses)
- [`IOutputCachePolicyProvider`](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/aspnetcore.md#ioutputcachepolicyprovider)
- [Auto-trust Development Certificates in WSL](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/aspnetcore.md#auto-trust-development-certificates-in-wsl)
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/aspnetcore.md)

## **üì± .NET MAUI**

- [XAML Source Generation by Default](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/dotnetmaui.md#xaml-source-generation-by-default)

### **.NET for Android**

- [CoreCLR by Default](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/dotnetmaui.md#coreclr-by-default)
- [`dotnet run`
Enhancements](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/dotnetmaui.md#dotnet-run-enhancements)

Browse the [full release notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/dotnetmaui.md) for all of this and more.

## **üñ•Ô∏è Windows Forms**

This release focused on quality improvements. A full list of changes can be found in the [release notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/winforms.md).

## **üñ•Ô∏è Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF)**

This release focused on quality improvements, including fixes for Fluent window backdrop and background in Windows 10. A full list of changes can be found in the [release notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/wpf.md).

## **üéÅ Entity Framework Core**

- [Complex Types and JSON Columns on Entity Types with TPT/TPC Inheritance](https://learn.microsoft.com/ef/core/what-is-new/ef-core-11.0/whatsnew#complex-types-and-json-columns-on-entity-types-with-tpttpc-inheritance)
- [Create and Apply Migrations in One Step](https://learn.microsoft.com/ef/core/what-is-new/ef-core-11.0/whatsnew#create-and-apply-migrations-in-one-step)
- [Azure Cosmos DB Transactional Batches](https://learn.microsoft.com/ef/core/what-is-new/ef-core-11.0/whatsnew#transactional-batches)
- [Azure Cosmos DB Bulk Execution](https://learn.microsoft.com/ef/core/what-is-new/ef-core-11.0/whatsnew#bulk-execution)
- [Azure Cosmos DB Session Token Management](https://learn.microsoft.com/ef/core/what-is-new/ef-core-11.0/whatsnew#session-token-management)
- [Full Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/efcore.md)

## **üì¶ Container Images**

.NET 11 Preview 1 does not introduce new container image features. Browse the [full release notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/11.0/preview/preview1/containers.md) for details.

## üöÄ Get started

To get started with .NET 11, [install the .NET 11 SDK](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet/11.0).

If you‚Äôre on Windows using Visual Studio, we recommend installing the latest [Visual Studio 2026 Insiders](https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/insiders). You can also use Visual Studio Code and the [C# Dev Kit](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-dotnettools.csdevkit) extension with .NET 11.
Title: .NET 11 Preview 1 is now available!
